summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email from Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant to an unknown recipient, expressing Epstein's surprise at not having heard from them. It is a brief communication that shows Epstein's direct involvement in following up with contacts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is from his executive assistant conveying a message from him expressing surprise at not hearing from the recipient.

events.title: Epstein follow-up email
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant forwards a message from Epstein expressing surprise at not hearing from the recipient.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email from Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant dated February 21, 2007.
The message conveys Epstein's direct statement: 'I'm surprised I haven't heard from you.'
The communication shows Epstein was actively following up with contacts through his assistant.
